verses.verse: Then we <S%H6437>turned<s%>, and took our <S%H5265>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto me: and we <S%H5437>compassed<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Ye have <S%H5437>compassed<s%> this <S%H2022>mountain<s%> long <S%H7227>enough<s%>: <S%H6437>turn<s%> you <S%H6828>northward<s%>.

And <S%H6680>command<s%> thou the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Ye are to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of your <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>, which <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir<s%>; and they shall be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of you: take ye <S%H3966>good<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> unto yourselves therefore:

<S%H1624>Meddle<s%> not with them; for I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> you of their <S%H776>land<s%>, no, not so much as a <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H4096%H3709>breadth<s%>; because I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> unto <S%H6215>Esau<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession<s%>.

Ye shall <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>meat<s%> of them for <S%H3701>money<s%>, that ye may <S%H398>eat<s%>; and ye shall also <S%H3739>buy<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> of them for <S%H3701>money<s%>, that ye may <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> thee in all the <S%H4639>works<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>: he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> thy <S%H3212>walking<s%> through this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: these <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath been with thee; thou hast <S%H2637>lacked<s%> <S%H1697>nothing<s%>.

And when we <S%H5674>passed<s%> by from our <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>, which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, through the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6160>plain<s%> from <S%H359>Elath<s%>, and from <S%H6100>Ezion-gaber<s%>, we <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H6696>Distress<s%> not the <S%H4124>Moabites<s%>, neither <S%H1624>contend<s%> with them in <S%H4421>battle<s%>: for I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> thee of their <S%H776>land<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession<s%>; because I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6144>Ar<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession<s%>.
The <S%H368>Emims<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> therein in times <S%H6440>past<s%>, a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%>, and <S%H7227>many<s%>, and <S%H7311>tall<s%>, as the <S%H6062>Anakims<s%>;
<S%H1992>Which<s%> also were <S%H2803>accounted<s%> <S%H7497>giants<s%>, as the <S%H6062>Anakims<s%>; but the <S%H4125>Moabites<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> them <S%H368>Emims<s%>.

The <S%H2752>Horims<s%> also <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir<s%> <S%H6440>beforetime<s%>; but the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3423>succeeded<s%> them, when they had <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them from <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in their stead; as <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H3425>possession<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto them.
Now rise <S%H6965>up<s%>, said I, and get you <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H2218>Zered<s%>. And we went <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H2218>Zered<s%>.

And the <S%H3117>space<s%> in which we <S%H1980>came<s%> from <S%H6947>Kadesh-barnea<s%>, until we were come <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H2218>Zered<s%>, was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>; until all the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> were wasted <S%H8552>out<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto them.
For indeed the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was against them, to <S%H2000>destroy<s%> them from <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%>, until they were <S%H8552>consumed<s%>.
¶ So it came to pass, when all the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> were <S%H8552>consumed<s%> and <S%H4191>dead<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>,
That the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Thou art to pass <S%H5674>over<s%> through <S%H6144>Ar<s%>, the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, this <S%H3117>day<s%>:

And when thou comest <S%H7126>nigh<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, <S%H6696>distress<s%> them not, nor <S%H1624>meddle<s%> with them: for I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> thee of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> any <S%H3425>possession<s%>; because I have <S%H5414>given<s%> it unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession<s%>.

(That also was <S%H2803>accounted<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7497>giants<s%>: <S%H7497>giants<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> therein in old <S%H6440>time<s%>; and the <S%H5984>Ammonites<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> them <S%H2157>Zamzummims<s%>;

A <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%>, and <S%H7227>many<s%>, and <S%H7311>tall<s%>, as the <S%H6062>Anakims<s%>; but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> them; and they <S%H3423>succeeded<s%> them, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in their stead:

As he <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%>, which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, when he <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> the <S%H2752>Horims<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> them; and they <S%H3423>succeeded<s%> them, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in their stead even unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>:

And the <S%H5761>Avims<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2699>Hazerim<s%>, even unto <S%H5804>Azzah<s%>, the <S%H3732>Caphtorims<s%>, which came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H3731>Caphtor<s%>, <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in their stead.)

¶ Rise ye <S%H6965>up<s%>, take your <S%H5265>journey<s%>, and pass <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H769>Arnon<s%>: <S%H7200>behold<s%>, I have <S%H5414>given<s%> into thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and his <S%H776>land<s%>: <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, and <S%H1624>contend<s%> with him in <S%H4421>battle<s%>.

This <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H6343>dread<s%> of thee and the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of thee upon the <S%H6440%H5971>nations<s%> that are under the whole <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, who shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H8088>report<s%> of thee, and shall <S%H7264>tremble<s%>, and be in <S%H2342>anguish<s%> because of <S%H6440>thee<s%>.

¶ And I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> out of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6932>Kedemoth<s%> unto <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> with <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Let me <S%H5674>pass<s%> through thy <S%H776>land<s%>: I will <S%H3212>go<s%> along by the high <S%H1870%H1870>way<s%>, I will neither <S%H5493>turn<s%> unto the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> nor to the <S%H8040>left<s%>.

Thou shalt <S%H7666>sell<s%> me <S%H400>meat<s%> for <S%H3701>money<s%>, that I may <S%H398>eat<s%>; and <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H3701>money<s%>, that I may <S%H8354>drink<s%>: only I will pass <S%H5674>through<s%> on my <S%H7272>feet<s%>;

(As the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> which <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, and the <S%H4125>Moabites<s%> which <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H6144>Ar<s%>, <S%H6213>did<s%> unto me;) until I shall pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> us.

But <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not let us <S%H5674>pass<s%> by him: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7185>hardened<s%> his <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, and made his <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H553>obstinate<s%>, that he might <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him into thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, as appeareth this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H7200>Behold<s%>, I have <S%H2490>begun<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> and his <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee: <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%>, that thou mayest <S%H3423>inherit<s%> his <S%H776>land<s%>.
Then <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> us, he and all his <S%H5971>people<s%>, to <S%H4421>fight<s%> at <S%H3096>Jahaz<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> us; and we <S%H5221>smote<s%> him, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and all his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And we <S%H3920>took<s%> all his <S%H5892>cities<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, and utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> the <S%H4962>men<s%>, and the <S%H802>women<s%>, and the little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, of every <S%H5892>city<s%>, we <S%H7604>left<s%> none to <S%H8300>remain<s%>:
Only the <S%H929>cattle<s%> we took for a <S%H962>prey<s%> unto ourselves, and the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which we <S%H3920>took<s%>.

From <S%H6177>Aroer<s%>, which is by the <S%H8193>brink<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, and from the <S%H5892>city<s%> that is by the <S%H5158>river<s%>, even unto <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, there was not one <S%H7151>city<s%> too <S%H7682>strong<s%> for us: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> all unto <S%H6440>us<s%>:

Only unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> thou <S%H7126>camest<s%> not, nor unto any <S%H3027>place<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H2999>Jabbok<s%>, nor unto the <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, nor unto whatsoever the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>forbad<s%> us.
